comments.text:
I hit the following every time running mochitest-chrome on my Ubuntu 10.10 box:

ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/layout/inspector/tests/chrome/test_bug467669.xul | number of fonts for mixed Latin & Chinese - got 3, expected 2

Uncommenting the call to report() in the test file gives:
test3 fonts: Ubuntu, Un Dotum, TakaoPGothic
comments.raw_text:
I hit the following every time running mochitest-chrome on my Ubuntu 10.10 box:

ERROR TEST-UNEXPECTED-FAIL | chrome://mochitests/content/chrome/layout/inspector/tests/chrome/test_bug467669.xul | number of fonts for mixed Latin & Chinese - got 3, expected 2

Uncommenting the call to report() in the test file gives:
test3 fonts: Ubuntu, Un Dotum, TakaoPGothic
